title: Her Double Deputies
description: Elise Ross is one tough Southern cowgirl, especially when it comes to her heart. Losing her one and only lover nearly killed her. Now her past might finish off the job.Tommy and Vic Ollsen, twin deputies of Delite, are pursuing a romantic interest in her. She thinks that they’re just doing their job, because every time a Dixie Chix was in trouble, Tommy and Vic were her instant bodyguards. Now Tagart McKeiver is showing an interest in her too. The Tennessee businessman is not who he seems, and it’s too late when she realizes that he’s the one who killed her boyfriend back in Tennessee.Elise is caught in the middle of an illegal bull riding operation that could cost Tommy and Vic their lives. When it’s either leave with Tagart or let him get away with killing them, she makes the decision to allow history to repeat itself. She would rather die herself.Note: There is no sexual relationship or touching for titillation between or among siblings.[Siren Ménage Everlasting: Erotic Cowboy Ménage a Trois Romance, M/F/M, bondage, HEA]
author: Dixie Lynn Dwyer
